description: The Underground Donut Tour is Toronto's Only Donut Tour. Making 4 stops at some of the cities best donut shops, you'll sample all the best donuts Toronto has to offer. A two hour walking tour, led by a passionate donut expert, they’ll guide you to some of the best donut locales. We cater to all size groups, both large and small.

reviews.title: Great tour!  Great guide!  Great donuts!
text: Great tour!  We learned so much about a number of amazing, eclectic neighborhood.  Our tour guide was funny, thoughtful, knowledgeable, and personable.  Great with the grown ups and the kids (9 & 11).  Oh yeah.  And there were donuts.  Lots of really tasty donuts!!!

reviews.title: Donuts and a show!
text: Yummmmmm! Super fun and delicious tour. We all had a great time and Willy Dubs was a fantastic host. Since he’s also a comedian, our tour was not just sugary and tasty but also filled with fun and laughter. Thanks for a fun morning!

reviews.title: Very good!
text: We had a great time on this tour, and were happy that our guide, Soniya, was able to offer vegan options, modifying the tour stops to accommodate. It was an informative, interesting, and delicious experience!

reviews.title: Donuts, graffiti and more
text: Tried a bunch of places we wouldn't have found on our own and learned about the city. Hearing the stories behind some of the art at Graffiti Alley help give it all context.

reviews.title: A great walking tour
text: We loved the neighbourhoods we walked through almost as much as the donuts we ate.  A great way to see the city you visit, live or work in

reviews.title: Underground Donut Tasting
text: Excellent trip. Many donut places I would've just walked past. All super tasty. Eiton was an excellent guide and made the trip a lot of fun.

reviews.title: Went for the Donughts and stayed for the art
text: My wife and I had a wonderful time. The doughnuts were delicious and big. By the time we came to the end we were so full we had to take our final doughnut home with us. The tour guide 'Will' very informative and overall a great tour guide of Toronto.  Its much more than a Donught tour its also an art tour and a quick trip through Kensington area of Toronto.  They were having a event the day we were there, the music the food the people, WOW! We would do it again.

reviews.title: Awesome doughnut tour. Check it out!!
text: Went on the doughnut tour today with Sonia and had an awesome time. Lots of fun and the food was amazing. Sonia was friendly and had shared lots of fun facts as we were walking the city. Thank you for a really great time!!!

reviews.title: Who could complain about eating donuts!
text: Soo many delicious 🤤 DONUTS! We would’ve NEVER found these places on our own! And our guide Antone was the best! He showed us many hidden gems that are right under your nose in Toronto! He was awesome!

reviews.title: Donut tour Toronto
text: The donuts were amazing! Eitan was a great guide! He had lots of knowledge to offer about donuts and Toronto. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Arrived Hungry; Left Very Satisfied
text: Underground Donut Tour always does an amazing job of putting together these tours and their staff is fantastic. The Toronto tour may be a bit new, but lived up to the high standards. Great fun and delicious donut spots that I wouldn't have normally checked out. The tour was a lot of fun and the donuts are so good. COPS was my favorite probably because of the DunkAroos glazed mini donuts (one of the weekly rotational glaze flavors) which checked all the nostalgic flavor boxes for me, but all donut stops on the tour were amazing. I also love that the people that give these tours are the best for any other recommendations for travelers. Aton (hopefully I'm spelling that right) had a flavor palette that one could describe as like that of your best cooking / baking nanna. Lots of floral flavor recommendations and they really worked for me. And if floral flavors aren't your thing, he could definitely recommend something that hits the spot for everyone. His recommendations for other restaurants were perfect. The really guy knew his food (especially donuts). If you are going to be in Toronto for a few days at least, I would suggest go on this tour early into your trip. You'll get the best recommendations for the rest of your travelling days. Overall, great tour, exceptionally tasty donuts, and just a fun time walking around the city. Come hungry and you'll leave very satisfied.

reviews.title: A wonderful time
text: Our guide was fantastic. He was very knowledgeable and we had really good donuts. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Great donuts and guide!
text: Willy Dubs was a great guide and I really appreciated his authenticity throughout the tour. Got to eat fantastic donuts! My partner and I really enjoyed this tour. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Amazing time! Totally recommend.
text: So great! Had such a lovely time and our guide was fantastic. Donuts were DELICIOUS and the perfect amount.

reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
text: Our tour guide, Sonia, was amazing! And the donuts eaten along the tour were fresh, delicious and will leave you wanting more!! 10/10 would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Loved my Donut Tour with Sinuhe!!
text: I had so much fun on this donut Tour! As someone who loves sweets I was very happy to even see that this even existed. Had to book it right away. What made it really amazing was my tour guide Sinuhe! You get to select what type of donut(s) you want at each spot witch was awesome. We did not just talk about donuts, he also took me to see see some street art and beautiful parks along the way. He was even nice enough to take some photos for me and he taught me some interesting things about Toronto! I would definitely take this tour, and if you get Sinuhe you won’t be disappointed! My sweet toothe was more than satisfied :)

reviews.title: Yummy way to see the city!
text: This was a great (and tasty) way to explore parts of Toronto we hadn't yet visited. Lovely to be guided by a local and to be shown some really tasty donut spots. The brown butter sea salt from Dipped was outta this world! Thank you A-ton.

reviews.title: Great tour!
text: Really great tour.  Enjoyed learning about the local area - particularly enjoyed graffiti alley - as well as eating delicious donuts.  Aton was a terrific guide.  Thank you!

reviews.title: Donuts and exploring!
text: Definitely enough donuts! Nice route including 3 areas of Toronto you don’t want to miss. Sinuhe really cares about his tour and that we have a good time.

reviews.title: Fill your belly and your knowledge!
text: Our guide was awesome!
Donuts where delicious 🤤
Get ready to learn more and not just about donuts!!
Toronto has a lot to offer!!

reviews.title: Highly recommended for local and visiting donut lovers!
text: Amazing tour with amazing treats!

As locals to Toronto, it was great to find some new donut spots we had never tried before. Sonia, our guide, was very knowledgeable about the area and stops and we even learned some new things about the city! The tour was well balanced with time in between stops, and we had more than enough to eat (we were struggling to finish our donuts at the end!).
Would absolutely highly recommend this tour to locals and visitors!

reviews.title: Kensington Donut tour
text: Sonia is a great tour guide. We had lots of fun getting a taste of different donut flavours. We went to four locations spread around Kensington. Sonia gave us a good talk on the shops history and the different donut flavours.

reviews.title: Tasty Adventure
text: We had so much fun! Our tour guide was funny, sweet and took great care of us. We learned a lot about Toronto. I would recommend to anyone who likes tasty treats!

reviews.title: Cozy Donuts with Willy
text: We had an Amazing tour with WillyDubs!  He shared some great donut spots with us, along with info about living in Toronto! We got lucky to be the only group on the tour, so he happily indulged all of our questions and need to stop and take pics.  Highly recommend the tour and WillyDubs as your guide! PS…You now have new followers Willy 😁

reviews.title: Great and yummy way to see Toronto. Also met nice people!
text: Aton was such a great host!! It was fun to walk around Toronto. All of the donuts were great except the second place. Didn’t care for Bloomers at all. All the roping’s fell off so it was just dough. I enjoyed it quite a bit. I just think for $180 for three people, the value could have been a lot better. Maybe include coffee. And definitely switch out Bloomers for a better tasting place.

reviews.title: Excellent Tour, perfectly paced
text: Our guide, Eitan was incredible! He gave us so much to look forward to, as well as delicious donut knowledge! The tour is unique, fun, and if you're into donuts, this was such a great way to tour Toronto and eat! Perfectly paced. One thing to note: you are not returned to where you started, so if you are directionally challenged, the directions back to the original meeting place are easy to follow.

reviews.title: Fun family tour
text: Great tour! Saw things we would have missed. Guide was interesting and fun.  Donuts were great too and a wide variety of types and flavors!

reviews.title: Not just a donut tour…
text: Sonya was a fantastic tour guide, knowledgeable and entertaining. And not just about donuts! We learned so much about local history and even about graffiti artists of Toronto! An enthusiastic five stars!

reviews.title: So delicious!
text: 11/10 recommend! My friend and I had a private tour lead by Sonja who was the sweetest guide. Sonja took us to 4 donut shops, graffiti alley and Kensington market. We ate so many delicious donuts, took some great photos, and learned about some of Toronto's food culture.
Head Sonja's warning and don't eat your donuts too fast, you fill up quickly!
If you are visiting Toronto and love donuts, this tour is a must!

reviews.title: Eiton was awesome
text: Eiton was amazing, we had a wonderful time. COPS was the best, but they were all good. It was a great time, worth it for sure!

reviews.title: Yummy Tour
text: A fun, informative, friendly, fantastic and delicious doughnut tour. We would highly recommend this experience. What a great way to tour Toronto.

reviews.title: Donuts for breakfast? Don't mind if I do!
text: Sinuhe was an amazing tour guide. Very fun and energetic. Made our experience personal.
All the donuts were delicious. It was definitely enough for me. It was awesome to try so many flavours in small amounts.

My favorite part of the tour (besides the donuts) was cutting through graffiti ally. It was an awesome artsy walk with lots of cool graffiti, Sinuhe was knowledgeable and quite respectful to the art form.
It was quite the hot day which can't be helped. It did for me become to hot at the last stop but I liked the fact he got us to go boxes knowing we may be to tired to do the last shop.

I would recommend this tour to any friend interested in walking through Toronto, who wants to visit Kensington Market (ending there and exploring is a great way to spend the day), and of course if you're a fan of donuts. I think I would've missed some great spots on my trip without our tour.

reviews.title: Donuts For The Win!
text: This was such a fun way to spend the morning in Toronto. Aton our guide was knowledgeable and easy going, and the donuts we tried were amazing. Truly. We learned a bit about the city and had some of the best donuts I've ever tried. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: DONUT miss it!
text: So much fun on the Toronto donut tour!  Our tour guide Eton was a delight and so knowledgeable about Toronto.  We loved the walk around a great neighborhood and sampling a diverse array of delectable donuts around town.

reviews.title: Delicious Tour
text: Tour was well organized and very informative about both the businesses we visited as well as local culture/history. The donuts were delicious! Our guide Rondet (sorry for the spelling!) was wonderful! He kept a good pace, allowed extra time when we were really interested in an area, had a warm personality and was very professional and considerate. I would highly recommend this tour for anyone wanting to learn more about day-to-day life in Toronto while eating delicious donuts!

reviews.title: Delicious Doughnuts 🍩
text: Really enjoyable tour. The doughnuts were all amazing, but the ones from Cops were our favourites. Sonia, our guide, was lovely and very interesting to chat to. Highly recommend for anyone who wants to see some of Toronto on foot with teens in tow who might get hangry 🤣

reviews.title: Enjoyed the donuts and the tour!
text: I loved our tour. Will was hilarious and informative - this guy should be scooped up by a Hollywood agent because he's a talented comic - and the donuts were delicious.

reviews.title: The Toronto Kensington Market Donut Tour is Awesome!
text: The Toronto Kensington Market Donut Tour is Awesome! A great way to spend a few hours and learn a lot about this area in Toronto. The donuts are all delicious and you get to have many different kinds. I tried a Mexican churro donut for the first time, hot and delicious. Our tour guides, Maria and Eitan were great and really provided a welcoming and casual feel to the tour. Plus, they both really know the area history and all about the cool donut shops that you visit along the way.

reviews.title: Great Donuts in Toronto!
text: Had a great time tasting donuts and learning a bit about Toronto with Anton & Maria!! Loved seeing some of the street art in addition to amazing donuts!

reviews.title: Incredible Tour … 100% recommend
text: Incredible tour of Toronto, with educational insights on the history of Toronto and of course  a variety of amazing donuts. Our tour guide Sinuhe was very knowledgeable and made the experience fun, insightful and memorable.
